Text:
Hey ! Thx for uploading it here on TPB !

I noticed after I made the request Demonoid was back on track lol ... but still thx ... I had the first 2 and this one is downloading now.

I saw you had a part 4 also on the way ... how much are still coming?

Awesome Job. I actually have most of these already but to have them all sorted out by reading order is magnificent. Sure for the early stuff its no problem but starting with the 80s it gets hectic :).

Thanks!
